ambassadors.name: Maci Schoonover

ambassadors.name: David
ambassadors.bio: üåü Meet David! Elite Meals & Catering partnered with David, the owner of Metroflex Mansfield, to revolutionize the health and wellness world‚Äîone meal at a time. As a gym owner, personal trainer, and nutrition coach, David brings unmatched expertise and passion to helping others achieve their goals. He works with clients of all fitness levels‚Äîfrom beginners to elite athletes‚Äîoffering tailored training programs and practical nutrition guidance. Whether you‚Äôre building strength, improving endurance, or pursuing a healthier lifestyle, David is your go-to coach for real results. We‚Äôre proud to have him as part of the Elite Meals & Catering family, where his dedication and leadership continue to inspire our community every day. üí™

ambassadors.name: Jeremie
ambassadors.bio: With 13 years of training experience, Jeremie's passion for health and fitness runs deep. Outside the gym, he enjoys time with his wife, sons, and bonus sons, riding motorcycles, and watching movies and anime. Jeremie is eager to share his journey and showcase the awesome meals Elite Meals and Catering provides.

ambassadors.name: Marisol
ambassadors.bio: A full-time working wife and proud mom of two, Marisol makes fitness a priority in her busy lifestyle. From CrossFit and lifting to keeping up with her kids‚Äô soccer schedules, she brings balance, energy, and dedication to everything she does.

ambassadors.name: Lacy Beckler
ambassadors.bio: A lifelong fitness enthusiast and former track & field athlete turned CrossFit competitor, Lacy has been active in the sport since 2013 and is a certified CF-L1 Trainer. Outside the gym, she travels, does DIY projects, gardens, and enjoys time with family, friends, and her four pups. With 20 years in public education and now a Project Manager for Mansfield ISD, she balances a busy career with passion for fitness, faith, and life.

ambassadors.name: Macaela
ambassadors.bio: With a background in powerlifting, Macaela is training for her first figure competition under the guidance of her coach, David Cuff. She‚Äôs also a real estate agent and a master‚Äôs student at Tarleton, balancing big goals with an even bigger schedule. By her side is her German Shepherd, Veena, and when she‚Äôs not working or training, she‚Äôs probably at a country concert.
